tool_description: TeleShield™ from TMT Analysis gives you the ability to detect and stop telephony fraud scams. Access to authoritative data using the TMT infrastructure enables easy integration into your business processes, using our powerful suite of telephone fraud prevention APIs. This covers Origin Based Rating (OBR) fraud, International Revenue Share Fraud (IRSF) and other common telephony fraud risks.
name: TMT Teleshield
title: TMT Teleshield

api_list.name: POST Teleshield
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tmt-teleshield.p.rapidapi.com/teleshield/00447592792463"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmt-teleshield.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tmt-teleshield.p.rapidapi.com/teleshield/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tmt-teleshield.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
